patthana16.51:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.51:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
